job.title: data scientist, Operations Analytics - Remote
job.description: strongNow Brewing  Data Scientist Operations Analytics tobeapartnerbrbrstrongstrongFrom the beginning Starbucks set out to be a different kind of companystrong One that not only celebrated coffee and its rich tradition but that also brought a feeling of connection We are known for developing and supporting partners who share this passion and are guided by their service to othersbrbrAs a Starbucks Data Scientist you will support the Operation Services organization and contribute to Starbucks success by guiding business decisions through utilizing data analysis and consulting that results in predicting outcomes understanding complex data relationships and developing a quantitative return on investment This position partners on a crossfunctional team of data scientists decision scientists and data analysts supporting strategic initiatives utilizing the latest in computing technologies and operating across customer transactions and data elements to unlock the opportunities to support our global businessbrbrstronguLeveraging Your Previous Experience We Will Enable You Tobrustrongul liUse statistical machine learning techniques to build models that address business needsli liExtract data from various data sources performs exploratory data analysis cleanses massages and aggregates datali liCollaborate cross functionally with other data scientists statisticians and business analysts to define business problems and implement solutionsli liEmploy scaling amp automation to data preparation techniquesli liConnect insights to business decision making options and next steps testing or research opportunitiesli liUnderstand business initiatives and serves as primary analytic resource in discussions with business partners to define business questionsli liDrive creation of final insights package and recommendations leads presentationli liDirect analytic component of implementation of insights into business processes and ensures appropriate testing takes placeli liDevelop project proposals gains stakeholder buyin and ensures timelines are metli liPromote and advocate value of advanced analytics to solve business problems within departmentli brbrulstronguWed Love To Hear From People Withbrustrongul liEducation BS with concentration in quantitative discipline  Stats Math Comp Sci Engineering Econ Quantitative Social Science or similar disciplineli liMinimum of 2 years industry experience in data scienceli liStrong background working with predictive and statistical modeling machine learning and strong expertise in all phases of the modeling pipelineli liExperience building complex data sets from multiple data sources both internally and externallyli liStrong SQL databases and ETL skills required including cleaning and managing datali liAdvanced competency and expertise in Python R or some combinationli liAbility to apply knowledge of multidisciplinary business principles and practices to achieve successful outcomes in crossfunctional projects and activitiesli liAbility to educate others on statistical  machine learning methodsli liSelfstarter attention to details and results orientated able to work under minimal guidanceli liProficient in communicating effectively with both technical and nontechnical stakeholdersli liRetail and eCommerce experience preferredli liExperience on Cloud platforms such as Azure AWS preferredli liExperience working with distributed data processing frameworks such as Spark and Data bricks and languages such as Java PySpark or Scala preferredli brbrulStarbucks and its brands are an equal opportunity employer of all qualified individualsbrbrWe are committed to creating a diverse and welcoming workplace that includes partners with diverse backgrounds and experiences We believe that enables us to better meet our mission and values while serving customers throughout our global communities People of color women LGBTQIA veterans and persons with disabilities are encouraged to applybrbrQualified applicants with criminal histories will be considered for employment in a manner consistent with all federal state and local ordinances
